mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point (pid, member_mid, points, payment_price, card_name, card_number, payment_date) VALUES (point_seq.NEXTVAL, 1, #{points}, #{paymentPrice}, #{cardName}, #{cardNumber}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT pid, points, payment_price, card_name, card_number, payment_date FROM point WHERE member_mid = 1 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
